thread.title: Donald Trump Speaks to Turkish and Spanish Allies, Touts NATO’s Importance - WSJ
thread.title_full: Donald Trump Speaks to Turkish and Spanish Allies, Touts NATO’s Importance - WSJ

author: Carol E. Lee
title: Donald Trump Speaks to Turkish and Spanish Allies, Touts NATO’s Importance - WSJ
text:
Donald Trump Speaks to Turkish and Spanish Allies, Touts NATO’s Importance Commitment to alliance comes after Republican warned of its obsolescence By @CarolELee Feb. 7, 2017 10:26 p.m. ET 
WASHINGTON—President Donald Trump spoke Tuesday with President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan of Turkey, a key ally in the U.S.-led fight against Islamic State, for the first time since taking office last month. 
Messrs. Trump and Erdogan discussed “the close, longstanding relationship between the United States and Turkey and their shared commitment to combating terrorism in all its forms,” the White House said in a statement. 
Mr. Trump... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
